content: Saying goodbye to Japan, but taking its essence back to NYC. Excited for what's next, yet there's this sweet uncertainty. Ready to blend cultures in a new way!
raw_content: Saying goodbye to Japan, but taking its essence back to NYC. Excited for what's next, yet there's this sweet uncertainty. Ready to blend cultures in a new way! 🇯🇵✈️🇺🇸 #CulturalExchange #NewBeginnings
